name: UpdateDashboardListItems
description:
Update dashboards in an existing dashboard list.

Use this tool to update the dashboards contained in a specific dashboard list within Datadog.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the dashboard list to update with new items.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to update items from.

parameters.name: new_dashboards
parameters.description: JSON object containing a list of dashboards with their IDs and types to update the dashboard list. Each dashboard should have an 'id' and a 'type' field.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to update the dashboard list to.

value_schema.description: New dashboards of the dashboard list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_id
parameters.description: ID of the dashboard list to update items from.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to update items from.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: New dashboards of the dashboard list.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to update the dashboard list to.

value_schema.description: New dashboards of the dashboard list.
